Package net.nergi.solutions

Interface Pe6fd.BitSet

All Known Implementing Classes:
Pe6fd.BitSet32, Pe6fd.BitSet64, Pe6fd.BitSet8, Pe6fd.BitSetArray
Enclosing class:
Pe6fd
public static interface Pe6fd.BitSet
An interface that represents collections that represent a set of integers from 0 to some upper bound. Instead of being backed by another collection, this set is backed by the bitwise representation of whether a number is in or not in the set.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(int x)
    Adds a number to the bit set.
    boolean contains​(int x)
    Checks if a number is in the set.
    Number getRepresentation()
    Returns the bit representation of this bit set.
    void intersect​(Pe6fd.BitSet s)
    Mutes the bit set to only contain the values contained in both it and s.
    default boolean isValid​(int x)  
    int maxStorableValue()
    Returns the maximum storable value in this bit set.
    void remove​(int x)
    Removes a number from the bit set.

      void add​(int x) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a number to the bit set.
      Parameters:
      x - Number to add to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - This is thrown if the number is out of range.

    • contains

      boolean contains​(int x)
      Checks if a number is in the set.
      Parameters:
      x - Number to query
      Returns:
      true if the number is in the set, false otherwise.

    • intersect

      Mutes the bit set to only contain the values contained in both it and s.
      Parameters:
      s - Set to intersect with
